welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Stolberg, Germany! Known for its charming cobblestone streets and historic architecture, we invite you to explore our city and soak in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories with us!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Geilenkirchen Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but users may experience slower speeds during peak travel times.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
